scripts.copy:monaco-editor-comp: npx shx mkdir -p ./static/libs && npx shx cp -fr ../node_modules/monaco-editor-comp/bundle ./static/libs/monaco-editor-comp
scripts.copy:monaco-workers: npx shx mkdir -p ./static/libs && npx shx cp -fr ../node_modules/monaco-editor-workers/dist ./static/libs/monaco-editor-workers
scripts.copy:worker: npx shx mkdir -p ../public/showcase/libs/worker && npx shx cp -fr ./dist/worker/serverWorker.js ../public/showcase/libs/worker
scripts.copy:app: npx shx mkdir -p ../public/showcase/ && npx shx cp -fr ./static/* ../public/showcase
